013package org.apache.juneau.utils;
014
015import static java.lang.Character.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.collections.JsonMap.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.Utils.*;
018import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
019
020import java.lang.reflect.*;
021import java.util.*;
022import java.util.function.*;
023
024import org.apache.juneau.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
026
027/**
028 * Allows arbitrary objects to be mapped to classes and methods base on class/method name keys.
029 *
030 * <p>
031 * The valid pattern matches are:
032 * <ul class='spaced-list'>
033 *  <li>Classes:
034 *       <ul>
035 *          <li>Fully qualified:
036 *             <ul>
037 *                <li><js>"com.foo.MyClass"</js>
038 *             </ul>
039 *          <li>Fully qualified inner class:
040 *             <ul>
041 *                <li><js>"com.foo.MyClass$Inner1$Inner2"</js>
042 *             </ul>
043 *          <li>Simple:
044 *             <ul>
045 *                <li><js>"MyClass"</js>
046 *             </ul>
047 *          <li>Simple inner:
048 *             <ul>
049 *                <li><js>"MyClass$Inner1$Inner2"</js>
050 *                <li><js>"Inner1$Inner2"</js>
051 *                <li><js>"Inner2"</js>
052 *             </ul>
053 *       </ul>
054 *    <li>Methods:
055 *       <ul>
056 *          <li>Fully qualified with args:
057 *             <ul>
058 *                <li><js>"com.foo.MyClass.myMethod(String,int)"</js>
059 *                <li><js>"com.foo.MyClass.myMethod(java.lang.String,int)"</js>
060 *                <li><js>"com.foo.MyClass.myMethod()"</js>
061 *             </ul>
062 *          <li>Fully qualified:
063 *             <ul>
064 *                <li><js>"com.foo.MyClass.myMethod"</js>
065 *             </ul>
066 *          <li>Simple with args:
067 *             <ul>
068 *                <li><js>"MyClass.myMethod(String,int)"</js>
069 *                <li><js>"MyClass.myMethod(java.lang.String,int)"</js>
070 *                <li><js>"MyClass.myMethod()"</js>
071 *             </ul>
072 *          <li>Simple:
073 *             <ul>
074 *                <li><js>"MyClass.myMethod"</js>
075 *             </ul>
076 *          <li>Simple inner class:
077 *             <ul>
078 *                <li><js>"MyClass$Inner1$Inner2.myMethod"</js>
079 *                <li><js>"Inner1$Inner2.myMethod"</js>
080 *                <li><js>"Inner2.myMethod"</js>
081 *             </ul>
082 *       </ul>
083 *    <li>Fields:
084 *       <ul>
085 *          <li>Fully qualified:
086 *             <ul>
087 *                <li><js>"com.foo.MyClass.myField"</js>
088 *             </ul>
089 *          <li>Simple:
090 *             <ul>
091 *                <li><js>"MyClass.myField"</js>
092 *             </ul>
093 *          <li>Simple inner class:
094 *             <ul>
095 *                <li><js>"MyClass$Inner1$Inner2.myField"</js>
096 *                <li><js>"Inner1$Inner2.myField"</js>
097 *                <li><js>"Inner2.myField"</js>
098 *             </ul>
099 *       </ul>
100 *    <li>Constructors:
101 *       <ul>
102 *          <li>Fully qualified with args:
103 *             <ul>
104 *                <li><js>"com.foo.MyClass(String,int)"</js>
105 *                <li><js>"com.foo.MyClass(java.lang.String,int)"</js>
106 *                <li><js>"com.foo.MyClass()"</js>
107 *             </ul>
108 *          <li>Simple with args:
109 *             <ul>
110 *                <li><js>"MyClass(String,int)"</js>
111 *                <li><js>"MyClass(java.lang.String,int)"</js>
112 *                <li><js>"MyClass()"</js>
113 *             </ul>
114 *          <li>Simple inner class:
115 *             <ul>
116 *                <li><js>"MyClass$Inner1$Inner2()"</js>
117 *                <li><js>"Inner1$Inner2()"</js>
118 *                <li><js>"Inner2()"</js>
119 *             </ul>
120 *       </ul>
121 *    <li>A comma-delimited list of anything on this list.
122 * </ul>
123 *
124 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
125 * </ul>
126 *
127 * @param <V> The type of object in this map.
128 */
129public class ReflectionMap<V> {
130
131   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
132   // Static
133   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
134
135   /**
136    * Static builder creator.
137    *
138    * @param <V> The type of object in this map.
139    * @param c The type of object in this map.
140    * @return A new instance of this object.
141    */
142   public static <V> Builder<V> create(Class<V> c) {
143      return new Builder<>();
144   }
145
146   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
147   // Builder
148   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
149
150   /**
151    * Builder class.
152    * @param <V> The type of object in this map.
153    */
154   public static class Builder<V> {
155      final List<ClassEntry<V>> classEntries;
156      final List<MethodEntry<V>> methodEntries;
157      final List<FieldEntry<V>> fieldEntries;
158      final List<ConstructorEntry<V>> constructorEntries;
159
160      /**
161       * Constructor.
162       */
163      protected Builder() {
164         classEntries = list();
165         methodEntries = list();
166         fieldEntries = list();
167         constructorEntries = list();
168      }
169
170      /**
171       * Copy constructor.
172       *
173       * @param copyFrom The builder being copied.
174       */
175      protected Builder(Builder<V> copyFrom) {
176         classEntries = copyOf(copyFrom.classEntries);
177         methodEntries = copyOf(copyFrom.methodEntries);
178         fieldEntries = copyOf(copyFrom.fieldEntries);
179         constructorEntries = copyOf(copyFrom.constructorEntries);
180      }
181
182      /**
183       * Adds a mapping to this builder.
184       *
185       * @param key
186       *    The mapping key.
187       *    <br>Can be any of the following:
188       *    <ul>
189       *       <li>Full class name (e.g. <js>"com.foo.MyClass"</js>).
190       *       <li>Simple class name (e.g. <js>"MyClass"</js>).
191       *       <li>All classes (e.g. <js>"*"</js>).
192       *       <li>Full method name (e.g. <js>"com.foo.MyClass.myMethod"</js>).
193       *       <li>Simple method name (e.g. <js>"MyClass.myMethod"</js>).
194       *       <li>A comma-delimited list of anything on this list.
195       *    </ul>
196       * @param value The value for this mapping.
197       * @return This object.
198       */
199      public Builder<V> append(String key, V value) {
200         if (Utils.isEmpty(key))
201            throw new BasicRuntimeException("Invalid reflection signature: [{0}]", key);
202         try {
203            splitNames(key, k -> {
204               if (k.endsWith(")")) {
205                  int i = k.substring(0, k.indexOf('(')).lastIndexOf('.');
206                  if (i == -1 || isUpperCase(k.charAt(i+1))) {
207                     constructorEntries.add(new ConstructorEntry<>(k, value));
208                  } else {
209                     methodEntries.add(new MethodEntry<>(k, value));
210                  }
211               } else {
212                  int i = k.lastIndexOf('.');
213                  if (i == -1) {
214                     classEntries.add(new ClassEntry<>(k, value));
215                  } else if (isUpperCase(k.charAt(i+1))) {
216                     classEntries.add(new ClassEntry<>(k, value));
217                     fieldEntries.add(new FieldEntry<>(k, value));
218                  } else {
219                     methodEntries.add(new MethodEntry<>(k, value));
220                     fieldEntries.add(new FieldEntry<>(k, value));
221                  }
222               }
223            });
224         } catch (IndexOutOfBoundsException e) {
225            throw new BasicRuntimeException("Invalid reflection signature: [{0}]", key);
226         }
227
228         return this;
229      }
230
231      /**
232       * Create new instance of {@link ReflectionMap} based on the contents of this builder.
233       *
234       * @return A new {@link ReflectionMap} object.
235       */
236      public ReflectionMap<V> build() {
237         return new ReflectionMap<>(this);
238      }
239
240      /**
241       * Creates a copy of this builder.
242       *
243       * @return A copy of this builder.
244       */
245      public Builder<V> copy() {
246         return new Builder<>(this);
247      }
248   }
249
250   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
251   // Instance
252   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
253
254   final ClassEntry<V>[] classEntries;
255   final MethodEntry<V>[] methodEntries;
256   final FieldEntry<V>[] fieldEntries;
257   final ConstructorEntry<V>[] constructorEntries;
258
259   /**
260    * Constructor.
261    *
262    * @param b Initializer object.
263    */
264   protected ReflectionMap(Builder<V> b) {
265      this.classEntries = b.classEntries.toArray(new ClassEntry[b.classEntries.size()]);
266      this.methodEntries = b.methodEntries.toArray(new MethodEntry[b.methodEntries.size()]);
267      this.fieldEntries = b.fieldEntries.toArray(new FieldEntry[b.fieldEntries.size()]);
268      this.constructorEntries = b.constructorEntries.toArray(new ConstructorEntry[b.constructorEntries.size()]);
269   }
270
271   static void splitNames(String key, Consumer<String> consumer) {
272      if (key.indexOf(',') == -1) {
273         consumer.accept(key);
274      } else {
275         int m = 0;
276         boolean escaped = false;
277         for (int i = 0; i < key.length(); i++) {
278            char c = key.charAt(i);
279            if (c == '(')
280               escaped = true;
281            else if (c == ')')
282               escaped = false;
283            else if (c == ',' && ! escaped) {
284               consumer.accept(key.substring(m, i).trim());
285               m = i+1;
286            }
287         }
288         consumer.accept(key.substring(m).trim());
289      }
290   }
291
292   /**
293    * Finds first value in this map that matches the specified class.
294    *
295    * @param c The class to test for.
296    * @param ofType Only return objects of the specified type.
297    * @return The matching object.  Never <jk>null</jk>.
298    */
299   public Optional<V> find(Class<?> c, Class<? extends V> ofType) {
300      for (ClassEntry<V> e : classEntries)
301         if (e.matches(c))
302            if (ofType == null || ofType.isInstance(e.value))
303               return Utils.opt(e.value);
304      return Utils.opte();
305   }
306
307   /**
308    * Finds first value in this map that matches the specified class.
309    *
310    * @param c The class to test for.
311    * @return The matching object.  Never <jk>null</jk>.
312    */
313   public Optional<V> find(Class<?> c) {
314      return find(c, null);
315   }
316
317   /**
318    * Finds all values in this map that matches the specified class.
319    *
320    * @param c The class to test for.
321    * @param ofType Only return objects of the specified type.
322    * @return A modifiable list of matching values.  Never <jk>null</jk>.
323    */
324   public List<V> findAll(Class<?> c, Class<? extends V> ofType) {
325      List<V> list = null;
326      for (ClassEntry<V> e : classEntries)
327         if (e.matches(c) && e.value != null)
328            if (ofType == null || ofType.isInstance(e.value))
329               list = lazyAdd(list, e.value);
330      return lazyList(list);
331   }
332
333   /**
334    * Finds all values in this map that matches the specified class.
335    *
336    * @param c The class to test for.
337    * @return A modifiable list of matching values.  Never <jk>null</jk>.
338    */
339   public List<V> findAll(Class<?> c) {
340      List<V> list = null;
341      for (ClassEntry<V> e : classEntries)
342         if (e.matches(c) && e.value != null)
343            list = lazyAdd(list, e.value);
344      return lazyList(list);
345   }
346
347   /**
348    * Finds all values in this map that matches the specified class.
349    *
350    * @param c The class to test for.
351    * @param ofType Only return objects of the specified type.
352    * @param array The array to append values to.
353    * @return The same list passed in or a new modifiable list if <jk>null</jk>.
354    */
355   public V[] appendAll(Class<?> c, Class<? extends V> ofType, V[] array) {
356      List<V> list = null;
357      for (ClassEntry<V> e : classEntries)
358         if (e.matches(c) && e.value != null)
359            if (ofType == null || ofType.isInstance(e.value))
360               list = lazyAdd(array, list, e.value);
361      return lazyArray(array, list);
362   }
363
364   private static <V> List<V> lazyAdd(List<V> list, V v) {
365      if (list == null)
366         list = list();
367      list.add(v);
368      return list;
369   }
370
371   /**
372    * Finds first value in this map that matches the specified method.
373    *
374    * @param m The method to test for.
375    * @param ofType Only return objects of the specified type.
376    * @return The matching object.  Never <jk>null</jk>.
377    */
378   public Optional<V> find(Method m, Class<? extends V> ofType) {
379      for (MethodEntry<V> e : methodEntries)
380         if (e.matches(m))
381            if (ofType == null || ofType.isInstance(e.value))
382               return Utils.opt(e.value);
383      return Utils.opte();
384   }
385
386   /**
387    * Finds first value in this map that matches the specified method.
388    *
389    * @param m The method to test for.
390    * @return The matching object.  Never <jk>null</jk>.
391    */
392   public Optional<V> find(Method m) {
393      return find(m, null);
394   }
395
396   /**
397    * Finds all values in this map that matches the specified method.
398    *
399    * @param m The method to test for.
400    * @param ofType Only return objects of the specified type.
401    * @return A modifiable list of matching values.  Never <jk>null</jk>.
402    */
403   public List<V> findAll(Method m, Class<? extends V> ofType) {
404      List<V> list = null;
405      for (MethodEntry<V> e : methodEntries)
406         if (e.matches(m) && e.value != null)
407            if (ofType == null || ofType.isInstance(e.value))
408               list = lazyAdd(list, e.value);
409      return lazyList(list);
410   }
411
412   /**
413    * Finds all values in this map that matches the specified method.
414    *
415    * @param m The method to test for.
416    * @return A modifiable list of matching values.  Never <jk>null</jk>.
417    */
418   public List<V> findAll(Method m) {
419      List<V> list = null;
420      for (MethodEntry<V> e : methodEntries)
421         if (e.matches(m) && e.value != null)
422            list = lazyAdd(list, e.value);
423      return lazyList(list);
424   }

427    * Finds all values in this map that matches the specified method.
428    *

430    * @param ofType Only return objects of the specified type.
431    * @param array The array to append values to.
432    * @return The same list passed in or a new modifiable list if <jk>null</jk>.
433    */
434   public V[] appendAll(Method m, Class<? extends V> ofType, V[] array) {
435      List<V> list = null;
436      for (MethodEntry<V> e : methodEntries)
437         if (e.matches(m) && e.value != null)
438            if (ofType == null || ofType.isInstance(e.value))
439               list = lazyAdd(array, list, e.value);
440      return lazyArray(array, list);
441   }

443   /**

445    *
446    * @param f The field to test for.
447    * @param ofType Only return objects of the specified type.
448    * @return The matching object.  Never <jk>null</jk>.
449    */
450   public Optional<V> find(Field f, Class<? extends V> ofType) {
451      for (FieldEntry<V> e : fieldEntries)
452         if (e.matches(f))
453            if (ofType == null || ofType.isInstance(e.value))
454               return Utils.opt(e.value);
455      return Utils.opte();
456   }

462    * @return The matching object.  Never <jk>null</jk>.
463    */
464   public Optional<V> find(Field f) {
465      return find(f, null);
466   }
467

513   }

521    */
522   public Optional<V> find(Constructor<?> c, Class<? extends V> ofType) {
523      for (ConstructorEntry<V> e : constructorEntries)
524         if (e.matches(c))
525            if (ofType == null || ofType.isInstance(e.value))
526               return Utils.opt(e.value);
527      return Utils.opte();
528   }

535    */

537      return find(c, null);
538   }

570   /**

572    *
573    * @param c The constructor to test for.
574    * @param ofType Only return objects of the specified type.
575    * @param array The array to append values to.
576    * @return The same list passed in or a new modifiable list if <jk>null</jk>.
577    */
578   public V[] appendAll(Constructor<?> c, Class<? extends V> ofType, V[] array) {
579      List<V> list = null;
580      for (ConstructorEntry<V> e : constructorEntries)
581         if (e.matches(c) && e.value != null)
582            if (ofType == null || ofType.isInstance(e.value))
583               list = lazyAdd(array, list, e.value);
584      return lazyArray(array, list);
585   }
586
587   static class ClassEntry<V> {
588      final String simpleName, fullName;
589      final V value;
590
591      ClassEntry(String name, V value) {
592         this.simpleName = simpleClassName(name);
593         this.fullName = name;
594         this.value = value;
595      }
596
597      public boolean matches(Class<?> c) {
598         if (c == null)
599            return false;
600         return classMatches(simpleName, fullName, c);
601      }
602
603      @Override
604      public String toString() {
605         return filteredMap()
606            .append("simpleName", simpleName)
607            .append("fullName", fullName)
608            .append("value", value)
609            .asString();
610      }
611   }
612
613   static class MethodEntry<V> {
614      String simpleClassName, fullClassName, methodName, args[];
615      V value;
616
617      MethodEntry(String name, V value) {
618         int i = name.indexOf('(');
619         this.args = i == -1 ? null : Utils.splitMethodArgs(name.substring(i+1, name.length()-1));
620         if (args != null) {
621            for (int j = 0; j < args.length; j++) {
622
623               // Strip off generic parameters.
624               int k = args[j].indexOf('<');
625               if (k > 0)
626                  args[j] = args[j].substring(0, k);
627
628               // Convert from xxx[][] to [[Lxxx; notation.
629               if (args[j].endsWith("[]")) {
630                  int l = 0;
631                  while (args[j].endsWith("[]")) {
632                     l++;
633                     args[j] = args[j].substring(0, args[j].length()-2);
634                  }
635                  StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(args[j].length() + l + 2);
636                  for (int m = 0; m < l; m++)
637                     sb.append('[');
638                  sb.append('L').append(args[j]).append(';');
639                  args[j] = sb.toString();
640               }
641            }
642         }
643         name = i == -1 ? name : name.substring(0, i);
644         i = name.lastIndexOf('.');
645         String s1 = name.substring(0, i).trim(), s2 = name.substring(i+1).trim();
646         this.simpleClassName = simpleClassName(s1);
647         this.fullClassName = s1;
648         this.methodName = s2;
649         this.value = value;
650      }
651
652      public boolean matches(Method m) {
653         if (m == null)
654            return false;
655         Class<?> c = m.getDeclaringClass();
656         return
657            classMatches(simpleClassName, fullClassName, c)
658            && (Utils.eq(m.getName(), methodName))
659            && (argsMatch(args, m.getParameterTypes()));
660      }
661
662      @Override
663      public String toString() {
664         return filteredMap()
665            .append("simpleClassName", simpleClassName)
666            .append("fullClassName", fullClassName)
667            .append("methodName", methodName)
668            .append("args", args)
669            .append("value", value)
670            .asString();
671      }
672   }
673
674   static class ConstructorEntry<V> {
675      String simpleClassName, fullClassName, args[];
676      V value;
677
678      ConstructorEntry(String name, V value) {
679         int i = name.indexOf('(');
680         this.args = splita(name.substring(i+1, name.length()-1));
681         name = name.substring(0, i).trim();
682         this.simpleClassName = simpleClassName(name);
683         this.fullClassName = name;
684         this.value = value;
685      }
686
687      public boolean matches(Constructor<?> m) {
688         if (m == null)
689            return false;
690         Class<?> c = m.getDeclaringClass();
691         return
692            classMatches(simpleClassName, fullClassName, c)
693            && (argsMatch(args, m.getParameterTypes()));
694      }
695
696      @Override
697      public String toString() {
698         return filteredMap()
699            .append("simpleClassName", simpleClassName)
700            .append("fullClassName", fullClassName)
701            .append("args", args)
702            .append("value", value)
703            .asString();
704      }
705   }
706
707   static class FieldEntry<V> {
708      String simpleClassName, fullClassName, fieldName;
709      V value;
710
711      FieldEntry(String name, V value) {
712         int i = name.lastIndexOf('.');
713         String s1 = name.substring(0, i), s2 = name.substring(i+1);
714         this.simpleClassName = simpleClassName(s1);
715         this.fullClassName = s1;
716         this.fieldName = s2;
717         this.value = value;
718      }
719
720      public boolean matches(Field f) {
721         if (f == null)
722            return false;
723         Class<?> c = f.getDeclaringClass();
724         return
725            classMatches(simpleClassName, fullClassName, c)
726            && (Utils.eq(f.getName(), fieldName));
727      }
728
729      @Override
730      public String toString() {
731         return filteredMap()
732            .append("simpleClassName", simpleClassName)
733            .append("fullClassName", fullClassName)
734            .append("fieldName", fieldName)
735            .append("value", value)
736            .asString();
737      }
738   }
739
740   static boolean argsMatch(String[] names, Class<?>[] args) {
741      if (names == null)
742         return true;
743      if (names.length != args.length)
744         return false;
745      for (int i = 0; i < args.length; i++) {
746         String n = names[i];
747         Class<?> a = args[i];
748         if (! (Utils.eq(n, a.getSimpleName()) || Utils.eq(n, a.getName())))
749            return false;
750      }
751      return true;
752   }
753
754   static String simpleClassName(String name) {
755      int i = name.indexOf('.');
756      if (i == -1)
757         return name;
758      return null;
759   }
760
761   static boolean classMatches(String simpleName, String fullName, Class<?> c) {
762      // For class org.apache.juneau.a.rttests.RountTripBeansWithBuilders$Ac$Builder
763      // c.getSimpleName() == "Builder"
764      // c.getFullName() == "org.apache.juneau.a.rttests.RountTripBeansWithBuilders$Ac$Builder"
765      // c.getPackage() == "org.apache.juneau.a.rttests"
766      String cSimple = c.getSimpleName(), cFull = c.getName();
767      if (Utils.eq(simpleName, cSimple) || Utils.eq(fullName, cFull) || "*".equals(simpleName))
768         return true;
769      if (cFull.indexOf('$') != -1) {
770         Package p = c.getPackage();
771         if (p != null)
772            cFull = cFull.substring(p.getName().length() + 1);
773         if (Utils.eq(simpleName, cFull))
774            return true;
775         int i = cFull.indexOf('$');
776         while (i != -1) {
777            cFull = cFull.substring(i+1);
778            if (Utils.eq(simpleName, cFull))
779               return true;
780            i = cFull.indexOf('$');
781         }
782      }
783      return false;
784   }
785
786   @Override /* Object */
787   public String toString() {
788      return filteredMap()
789         .append("classEntries", classEntries)
790         .append("methodEntries", methodEntries)
791         .append("fieldEntries", fieldEntries)
792         .append("constructorEntries", constructorEntries)
793         .asString();
794   }
795
796   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
797   // Utility methods
798   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
799
800   private static <V> List<V> lazyList(List<V> list) {
801      return list == null ? Collections.emptyList() : list;
802   }
803
804   private static <V> List<V> lazyAdd(V[] array, List<V> list, V v) {
805      if (list == null)
806         list = list(array);
807      list.add(v);
808      return list;
809   }
810
811   @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
812   private static <V> V[] lazyArray(V[] array, List<V> list) {
813      if (list == null)
814         return array;
815      array = (V[])Array.newInstance(array.getClass().getComponentType(), list.size());
816      list.toArray(array);
817      return array;
818   }
819}
